mapper.select:
select gt.id_ GRANTID, gt.debt_code, gt.grant_code, gt.iou_code, gt.currency, gt.grant_amt, gt.business_types, gt.product_name, rec.amount recamt, m.project_name, dept.dept_name, dept.CODE_ deptCode, mem.protseno, mem.mediumid ident_number, mem.workdate, mem.ltrddate, lndtl.PAYACTA, mem.totffamt, mem.tothkamt, dvi.fee, lndtl.OVRAMT, lndtl.OVRBAL, lndtl.INAMT, lndtl.INCURBAL, lndtl.OFAMT, lndtl.OFCURBAL, lndtl.INTRATE, lndtl.RLVRATE, lndtl.OVRRATE, lndtl.INCIRATE, lndtl.OFCIRATE, cdtl.AMOUNT, cone.cust_no, cone.cust_name_cn from INF_AFPCMEM mem INNER join biz_debt_main m on (m.enable_ = 1 and m.ident_number = mem.MEDIUMID) left join (select protype_.name_ PRODUCT_NAME,gt.* from BIZ_DEBT_GRANT gt,BIZ_PRODUCT_TYPES protype_ where gt.business_types = protype_.CODE_) gt on (gt.enable_ = 1 and gt.ident_number = mem.MEDIUMID) left join INF_AFRLNDTL lndtl on (mem.workdate = lndtl.workdate and mem.protseno = lndtl.protseno) left join INF_AFLNADVI dvi on (mem.workdate = dvi.workdate and mem.protseno = dvi.protseno) left join INF_AFRCDTL cdtl on (mem.protseno = cdtl.protseno and cdtl.listtype = '001') INNER JOIN SYS_DEPT dept ON gt.institution_code = dept.CODE_ left join BIZ_REPAYMENT_REC rec on (rec.enable_ = 1 and mem.workdate = rec.workdate and mem.protseno = rec.protseno) left join (select pts.cust_no,pts.cust_name_cn,renkey.debt_code from BIZ_RENTAL_FACTORING_KEY renkey,BIZ_PTS pts where pts.objtyp='BIZ_RENTAL_FACTORING_KEY' and pts.objinr=renkey.id_ and pts.rol='CONE') cone ON (cone.debt_code=gt.debt_code) where exists (select 1 from biz_debt_grant g where g.ident_number = mem.MEDIUMID)
and gt.INSTITUTION_CODE = #{cm.deptCode}
and gt.iou_code like '%'||#{cm.grantCode}||'%'
AND mem.workdate <= TO_DATE(#{cm.endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND mem.workdate >= TO_DATE(#{cm.beginDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and cone.cust_no like '%'||#{cm.proposer}||'%'

SELECT a.ID_, a.DEBT_CODE, a.GRANT_CODE, a.PROPOSER, a.BUSINESS_NAME, a.SCOPE_BUSIN_PERIOD, a.CURRENCY, a.GRANT_AMT, b.CODE_NAME FROM BIZ_DEBT_GRANT a INNER JOIN SYS_CURRENCY b ON a.CURRENCY = b.MON_CODE
and GRANT_CODE = #{grantCode}

SELECT MON_NO FROM SYS_CURRENCY
and MON_CODE = #{cm.currency}

select gt.id_ GRANTID, gt.debt_code, gt.grant_code, gt.iou_code, dept.code_ dept_code, dept.dept_name, m.bank_tell_id, m.project_name, gt.product_name, gt.currency, m.m_currency, m.SOLUTION_AMT, '是否联合承租', rental.biz_rental_factoring_code, 'ISSUEDATE', prop.cust_no propNo, prop.cust_name_cn propCn, prop.CUST_SCALE propScale, prop.ORGANIZATION_CODE propOrgNum, prop.CREDIT_RATING propRat, cone.cust_no coneNo, cone.cust_name_cn coneCn, cone.FINANCE_PLATFORM, cone.cust_scale coneScale, cone.ORGANIZATION_CODE coneOrgNum, cone.CREDIT_RATING coneRat, '担保方式', CASE gt.business_types WHEN 'PT0501000000' THEN '有追索权' WHEN 'PT0502000000' THEN '无追索权' END recourse, rental.leasehold, interest.TRADE_INTEREST_RATE, interest.POLICY_ATTRIBUTRE_CLASSIFY, '是否与他行银团放款', interest.Syndicated_Status, nlon.valueday, nlon.matudate, nlon.LOANTERM, nlon.currtype nlonsur, cdtl.amount, mem.totffamt, mem.tothkamt, lndtl.OVRAMT, '本金逾期天数', nlon.rateincm1, lndtl.Intrate, dvi.int1, dvi.fee from INF_AFPCMEM mem INNER join biz_debt_main m on (m.enable_ = 1 and m.ident_number = mem.MEDIUMID) inner join (select protype_.name_ PRODUCT_NAME,gt.* from BIZ_DEBT_GRANT gt,BIZ_PRODUCT_TYPES protype_ where gt.business_types = protype_.CODE_) gt on (gt.enable_ = 1 and gt.ident_number = mem.MEDIUMID) left join BIZ_INTEREST_RATE interest on (interest.enable_=1 and interest.debt_code=gt.debt_code and interest.grant_code=gt.grant_code) left join biz_rental_factoring rental on (rental.enable_=1 and rental.debt_code=gt.debt_code and interest.grant_code=gt.grant_code) left join INF_AELNLON nlon on (mem.workdate = nlon.workdate and mem.protseno = nlon.ACCNO) left join INF_AFRLNDTL lndtl on (mem.workdate = lndtl.workdate and mem.protseno = lndtl.protseno) left join INF_AFLNADVI dvi on (mem.workdate = dvi.workdate and mem.protseno = dvi.protseno) left join INF_AFRCDTL cdtl on (mem.protseno = cdtl.protseno and cdtl.listtype = '001') INNER JOIN SYS_DEPT dept ON gt.institution_code = dept.CODE_ left join BIZ_REPAYMENT_REC rec on (rec.enable_ = 1 and mem.workdate = rec.workdate and mem.protseno = rec.protseno) left join (select pts.cust_no,pts.cust_name_cn,renkey.debt_code,renkey.FINANCE_PLATFORM,cust.CUST_SCALE,cust.ORGANIZATION_CODE,cust.CREDIT_RATING from BIZ_RENTAL_FACTORING_KEY renkey,BIZ_PTS pts,biz_cust cust where pts.objtyp='BIZ_RENTAL_FACTORING_KEY' and pts.objinr=renkey.id_ and pts.rol='CONE' and pts.ptyinr=cust.id_) cone ON (cone.debt_code=gt.debt_code) left join (select pts.objinr,pts.cust_no,pts.cust_name_cn,cust.CUST_SCALE,cust.ORGANIZATION_CODE,cust.CREDIT_RATING from BIZ_PTS pts,biz_cust cust where pts.objtyp='BIZ_DEBT_MAIN' and pts.rol='APPT' and pts.ptyinr=cust.id_) prop ON (prop.objinr=m.id_) where exists (select 1 from biz_debt_grant g where g.ident_number = mem.MEDIUMID)
and gt.INSTITUTION_CODE = #{cm.deptCode}
and gt.iou_code like '%'||#{cm.grantCode}||'%'
AND mem.workdate = TO_DATE(#{cm.workdate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and cone.cust_no like '%'||#{cm.proposer}||'%'

SELECT TO_CHAR (A .ID_) ID_, TO_CHAR (C.ID_) GRANTID, A .DEBT_CODE, A .GRANT_CODE, B.DEPT_NAME, A .BANKTELL_NAME, A .PROJECT_NAME, A .PRODUCT_NAME, A .VALUE_DATE, A .DUE_DATE, F.BIZ_RENTAL_FACTORING_CODE, G .MAIN_BUSINESS, G .CREDIT_RATING, A .PROPOSER_NUM, A .PROPOSER, D .IDENT_NUMBER, E .AMT AMTBALANCE, G .CUST_SCALE, G .ORGANIZATION_CODE, CASE F.FINANCE_PLATFORM WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' END FINANCE_PLATFORM, J.NAME_ BUSINESS_TYPE_NAME, K .NAME_ INNOVATIVE_BUSINESS_TYPE, L.CODE_TEXT BACKGROUND_NATIONALITY, M .NAME_ LOAN_DOMAIN, N.NAME_ IMPOERT_EXPORT_GOODS_SERVICE, CASE I.TYOES_INDUSTRIAL WHEN '0' THEN '鼓励' WHEN '1' THEN '限制' WHEN '2' THEN '淘汰' WHEN '3' THEN '无' END TYOES_INDUSTRIAL, I.BUSINESS_CONTRACT_CODE, I.BUSINESS_CONTRACT_DATE, I.BUSINESS_CONTRACT_AMOUNT, O.NAME_ LOAN_CKASSIFICATION, CASE I.INDUSTRIAL_TRANSFORMATION WHEN 1 THEN '是' WHEN 2 THEN '否' END INDUSTRIAL_TRANSFORMATION, CASE I.CURTURAL_PRODUCT WHEN 1 THEN '是' WHEN 2 THEN '否' END CURTURAL_PRODUCT, CASE I.ALLEVIATION_LOAN WHEN 1 THEN '是' WHEN 2 THEN '否' END ALLEVIATION_LOAN, CASE I.TRADE_FINANCE_BUSINESS WHEN 1 THEN '政策性贷款项下贸金业务' WHEN 2 THEN '与政策性贷款支持方向相同的贸金业务' WHEN 3 THEN '非政策性业务' END TRADE_FINANCE_BUSINESS, CASE I.POLICY_ATTRIBUTRE_CLASSIFY WHEN '1' THEN '一带一路' WHEN '2' THEN '国际产能和装备制造合作' WHEN '3' THEN '重大装备出口和高新技术出口' WHEN '4' THEN '对外承包工程和境外投资' WHEN '5' THEN '能源、资源类' END POLICY_ATTRIBUTRE_CLASSIFY, P .NAME_ INDUSTRY_INVESTMENT, Q.NAME_ COMPARE, CASE I.IS_SYNDICATED WHEN 1 THEN '是' WHEN 2 THEN '否' END IS_SYNDICATED, CASE I.IS_SYNDICATED_AGENCY WHEN 1 THEN '是' WHEN 2 THEN '否' END IS_SYNDICATED_AGENCY, CASE I.SYNDICATED_STATUS WHEN 1 THEN '牵头行' WHEN 2 THEN '参与行' END SYNDICATED_STATUS, CASE I.IS_421 WHEN 1 THEN '是' WHEN 2 THEN '否' END IS_421, W.NAME_ EMERGING_INDUSTRY_CLASSIFY FROM BIZ_MAKE_LOANS A LEFT JOIN SYS_DEPT B ON A .INSTITUTION_CODE = B.CODE_ LEFT JOIN BIZ_DEBT_GRANT C ON C.GRANT_CODE = A .GRANT_CODE LEFT JOIN BIZ_DEBT_MAIN D ON A .DEBT_CODE = D .DEBT_CODE LEFT JOIN BIZ_CBB E ON A .ID_ = E .OBJINR AND E.CBC = 'LOANSUM' LEFT JOIN BIZ_RENTAL_FACTORING F ON F.DEBT_CODE = A .DEBT_CODE AND F.GRANT_CODE = A .GRANT_CODE LEFT JOIN BIZ_CUSTOMER G ON G .CUST_NO = A .PROPOSER_NUM AND G .DEBT_CODE = A .DEBT_CODE LEFT JOIN BIZ_INTEREST_RATE I ON I.DEBT_CODE = A .DEBT_CODE AND I.GRANT_CODE = A .GRANT_CODE LEFT JOIN BIZ_GUARANTEE_TYPE J ON I.BUSINESS_TYPE = J.CODE_ AND J.TYPE_ = '012' LEFT JOIN BIZ_GUARANTEE_TYPE K ON I.INNOVATIVE_BUSINESS_TYPE = K .CODE_ AND K .TYPE_ = '011' LEFT JOIN SYS_DIC L ON L.CODE_ = I.BACKGROUND_NATIONALITY AND L.TYPE_ = 'countryBack' LEFT JOIN BIZ_GUARANTEE_TYPE M ON I.LOAN_DOMAIN = M .CODE_ AND M .TYPE_ = '008' LEFT JOIN BIZ_GUARANTEE_TYPE N ON I.IMPOERT_EXPORT_GOODS_SERVICE = N.CODE_ AND N.TYPE_ = '010' LEFT JOIN BIZ_GUARANTEE_TYPE O ON I.LOAN_CKASSIFICATION = O.CODE_ AND O.TYPE_ = '009' LEFT JOIN BIZ_GUARANTEE_TYPE P ON I.INDUSTRY_INVESTMENT = P .CODE_ AND P .TYPE_ = '005' LEFT JOIN BIZ_GUARANTEE_TYPE Q ON I.COMPARE = Q.CODE_ AND Q.TYPE_ = '014' LEFT JOIN BIZ_GUARANTEE_TYPE W ON I.EMERGING_INDUSTRY_CLASSIFY = W.CODE_ AND W.TYPE_ = '006'
AND A.INSTITUTION_CODE = #{cm.deptCode}
AND A.GRANT_CODE like '%'||#{cm.grantCode}||'%'
AND A.DATE_OF_LOAN <= TO_DATE(#{cm.endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND E.BEGDAT <= TO_DATE(#{cm.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{cm.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') < E.ENDDAT
AND A.DATE_OF_LOAN >= TO_DATE(#{cm.beginDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND A.PROPOSER like '%'||#{cm.proposer}||'%'
AND A.ENABLE_ = #{cm.enable}
